name: Steam Mephit
description: A small elemental creature composed of steam and hot vapor, the Steam Mephit has a deceptive appearance and is fond of causing chaos.
memorable: The Steam Mephit explodes in a burst of steam upon its defeat, potentially damaging nearby foes and adding a final twist to encounters.
goals: To create chaos and confusion, often serving more powerful elemental masters.
relations: Commonly found with other elemental creatures, particularly in geothermal or volcanic regions.
environment: Hot springs, geothermal vents, or volcanic areas.
strengths: Immunities to fire and poison, capable of flight, and strategic use of steam attacks.
weaknesses: Low hit points and poor physical attributes, making it vulnerable in direct combat.
attacks: Uses claw attacks for slashing and fire damage, can unleash a cone of scalding steam to damage multiple enemies at once.
most_powerful_ability: Death Burst, which causes an explosion of steam that damages nearby creatures when it dies.
senses: Has improved passive perception of 13 and can effectively hide as a cloud of steam.
additional_information: Can cast the blur spell once per day.
Does not require air, food, or sleep.
Can camouflage itself as an ordinary cloud of steam.
Enjoys disrupting enemy plans with its chaotic abilities.
spellcasting: Can innately cast the blur spell without needing material components.
test_queries: chaotic steam elemental hiding in volcanoes
small flying creature that deals fire damage
elemental that explodes in steam when killed
steam creature that loves hot springs
